LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_StatusEnergyDesc: The total amount of shield energy available to this network. Intercepting projectiles drains energy, and if all energy is drained then the shield will collapse.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_StatusEnergyAction: Click to show or hide the capacitor grid.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_StatusHeatDesc: The total amount of heat in this network. Intercepting projectiles generates heat, and if system heat is too high then generators have a chance to overload, rendering them inoperable until system heat drops back down.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_StatusHeatAction: Click to show or hide the heatsink grid.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ColorDesc: Changes the color of this building. This change is purely visual and does not affect its functionality.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ColorCopyDesc: Copy the color of this building so it can be pasted to other buildings.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ColorPasteDesc: Paste the currently copied color onto this building.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ColorClearDesc: Clear the copied color from the clipboard.
